price: 15. Mpe totikaki yango ezala elembo, boye moto azali kaka kokanisa te?
arabic: وَلَقَد تَّرَكۡنَٰهَآ ءَايَةٗ فَهَلۡ مِن مُّدَّكِرٖ

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: walaqad taraknāhā āyatan fahal min muddakirin
